plugins\/zigbee\/plugin_info\/configurat.Cocher la case pour exclure du contrôleu: Check the box to automatically exclude from the controller Jeedom equipment corresponding to deleted devices

plugins\/zigbee\/desktop\/js\/zigbee.js.Dans ce mode Jeedom va automatiquement c: In this mode Jeedom will automatically create a command for each information returned by the module for 3min. plugins\/zigbee\/core\/class\/zigbee.cla.n\\'a pas envoyé de message depuis plus: has not sent a message for more than
plugins\/zigbee\/core\/class\/zigbee.cla.Aucun endpoints sur le module. Cela est: No endpoints on the module. This is often due to a partial inclusion, it is advisable to remove the module from the zigbee network and to re-include it (depending on the module it may be necessary to keep it awake for 2 minutes after the inclusion)
plugins\/zigbee\/core\/class\/zigbee.cla.Aucun cluster basic trouvé sur le module: No basic cluster found on the module. This is often due to a partial inclusion, it is advisable to remove the module from the zigbee network and to re-include it (depending on the module it may be necessary to keep it awake for 2 minutes following inclusion)
plugins\/zigbee\/core\/class\/zigbee.cla.Le message et le sujet ne peuvent pas êt: Message and subject cannot be empty

info.json.Plugin offrant une compatibilité général: Plugin offering general compatibility with different types of Zigbee controllers such as deCONZ and EZSP (Silicon labs), and in beta support: Zigate, XBee and Texas Instruments. It is important to read the plugin documentation carefully before any purchase
